original_text: and whenever burnt offerings were offered to the Lord on Sabbaths, new moons, and feast days, according to the number required of them, regularly before the Lord.
korean_text: 또 안식일과 초하루와 절기에 모든 번제를 여호와께 드리되 그가 명령하신 규례의 정한 수효대로 항상 여호와 앞에 드리며

sentences.original_text: and whenever burnt offerings were offered to the Lord
on Sabbaths, new moons, and feast days
according to the number required of them
